# Jewish Obituary

> The authoritative online resource for Jewish obituaries, memorials, and mourning traditions in North America.

## About

Jewish Obituary (jewishobituary.com) provides comprehensive resources for the Jewish community during times of loss. We offer obituary creation tools, educational guides on mourning traditions, directories of funeral homes and synagogues, and grief support resources. Our content is informed by rabbinical sources and serves Jews of all backgrounds - secular, Reform, Conservative, and Orthodox.

## Expertise Areas

- **Jewish Obituary Creation**: Templates, writing guides, and tools for creating meaningful obituaries
- **Mourning Traditions**: Comprehensive guides on shiva, kaddish, yahrzeit, sheloshim, and keriah
- **Funeral Customs**: Jewish funeral traditions, chevra kadisha, tahara, and burial practices
- **Community Resources**: Directories of synagogues, Jewish schools, and organizations
- **Grief Support**: Resources for navigating loss according to Jewish tradition
